title: (x) Woody Allen's "Matchpoint" movie credits - Windsor {Patricia}
content:
So I’m just dying to know if anyone knows 1: what font was used in the opening credits of matchpoint and 2: where I can get my hands on it

It has a very “silent film” type style to it.

shoot any thoughts to nicelykd AT vcu.edu

 [‹ (x) condensed serif "Contact Us" - ITC Leawood {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194822/http:/typophile.com/node/19070 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "New York" serif caps w/ swashes - Poetica {Judy} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194822/http:/typophile.com/node/19071 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nicelykd

comments.content:
Woody uses Windsor for all his titles I believe.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/windsor-sb/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194822/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/windsor-sb/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/windsor-sb/")

Patty is [right on](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194822/http:/typographi.com/000661.php) about his recent stuff.  
Earlier, he [varied a bit](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194822/http:/contactsheet.org/articles/woodys_typeface.html).
